ns9:component-version-script.script: echo "email=$EMAIL" > /etc/sumo.conf echo "password=$PASSWORD" >> /etc/sumo.conf echo "#Name is an optional property which defaults to hostname" >> /etc/sumo.conf if [ "$name" != "" ]; then echo "name=$NAME" >> /etc/sumo.conf fi

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
echo "Download SumoLogic Collector..." curl $DOWNLOAD_URL > collector.tar.gz tar xvf collector.tar.gz
mv sumocollector $COLLECTOR_HOME if [ ! -d "$COLLECTOR_HOME/config" ]; then echo Unepected error downloading the latest build... exit 1 fi cd $COLLECTOR_HOME rm *.bat
verDir=`cat config/wrapper.conf |grep wrapper.java.classpath.1 | cut -d/ -f2` echo Setting up Sumo Logic Collector $verDir
if [ `getconf LONG_BIT` = "64" ] then echo "Detected 64-bit" mv tanuki/linux64/wrapper . && mv tanuki/linux64/libwrapper.so $verDir/bin/native/lib ret=$? if [ $ret -ne 0 ];then exit 1 fi else echo "Detected 32-bit" mv tanuki/linux32/wrapper . && mv tanuki/linux32/libwrapper.so $verDir/bin/native/lib ret=$? if [ $ret -ne 0 ];then exit 1 fi fi sed -i 's:${JAVA_COMMAND_LOCATION}:/usr/bin/java:' config/wrapper.conf rm -rf tanuki chmod +x collector echo "Installing collector as a service" ./collector install
exit 0
